data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 7,828 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Le Marin, Martinique
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Le Marin, Martinique to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, help the 614 believers in Le Marin to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Le Marin. Through your servants plant 1 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rivière-Pilote
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rivière-Pilote, Le Marin, Martinique.
Jesus, purify the 614 believers in the state of Le Marin to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Le Marin, Martinique to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Le Marin, Martinique to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

location.name: Le Marin
location.cities_list: Kingstown, Le François, Kingstown Park, Ducos, Rivière-Pilote
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kingstown (24,518), Le François (19,682), Kingstown Park (17,994), Ducos (17,394), Rivière-Pilote (13,359)
